DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Flies the aircraft on an approach and then lands it on the angled flight deck of the carrier (indicated by the selected route). ONLY FOR A CARRIER THAT IS PART OF THE TERRAIN.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>runway</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Runway Route</myLabel> <myToolTip>A route object defining the carrier landing area.The first point of the route should be the beginning of the deck, and the second should be at the 3rd wire.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Routes</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtRoutesFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
